title: How to Make a Peanut Butter and Honey Sandwich

steps.headline: Spread peanut butter on one slice of the bread
Spread honey on the other slice of bread
Microwave honey in a bowl for about 15-30 seconds.
Stir peanut butter into the bowl when done.
Place bowl with peanut butter and honey mixture back in the microwave, cook for about 10-20 seconds.
Put this on bread and enjoy!

text: Simple Sandwich Method Toast bread in the toaster (optional)  Spread peanut butter on one slice of the bread  Spread honey on the other slice of bread  Put the sandwich together  Enjoy and savor your sandwich!  Microwave Sandwich Method Microwave honey in a bowl for about 15-30 seconds.  Stir peanut butter into the bowl when done.  Place bowl with peanut butter and honey mixture back in the microwave, cook for about 10-20 seconds.  Put this on bread and enjoy!
